query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST607 ( MANDT, CS607_YEAR, CS607_SEQ, CS607_TYP, CS607_JAMT, CS607_LAB_J, CS607_LAB_B, CS607_IAMT, CS607_LAB_N, CS607_DIR, CS607_INDIR, CS607_PCOST, CS607_RAT, CS607_SAMT, CS607_CPRC_5, CS607_PCOST_5, CS607_RAT_5, CS607_CART_5, CS607_MPRC, ERDAT, ERZZT, ERNAM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #CS607_YEAR#, #CS607_SEQ#, #CS607_TYP#, #CS607_JAMT#, #CS607_LAB_J#, #CS607_LAB_B#, #CS607_IAMT#, #CS607_LAB_N#, #CS607_DIR#, #CS607_INDIR#, #CS607_PCOST#, #CS607_RAT#, #CS607_SAMT#, #CS607_CPRC_5#, #CS607_PCOST_5#, #CS607_RAT_5#, #CS607_CART_5#, #CS607_MPRC#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID# )
